column1: This LLM Construction Law and Arbitration distance learning course provides practical, thorough and valuable teaching in the fast moving and highly specialist disciplines of construction law, construction adjudication and/or arbitration (depending on choice of route).This online course is suitable for legal professionals, and others with an interest in the legal issues surrounding construction claims, contracting, project management and surveying.This flexible course will equip you with an in-depth knowledge and understanding of key topics in the fields of construction law and dispute resolution processes, providing specific focus on those processes which run alongside traditional litigation.
